properties.areaDesc: Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued December 31 at 7:02PM EST until January 1 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 19 knots from the west with
gusts up to 27 knots. The largest significant waves will be 4
feet with a potential maximum wave height of 5 feet.

* WHERE...Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 7 PM EST Tuesday
with the largest waves expected around 7 PM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST WEDNESDAY
